storyInfo: The three parties fight inside the town, and Severin collapses from his illness. The suspect that GreyThroat manages to find is already dead. As the trail goes cold, Folinic is visibly shaken. Mudrock has resolved to show the meaning of true strength.

attributes.content: C'mon, over here!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The markings here... they look like they're simply venting.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Severin thought this was some kind of calculated sabotage. But was it, actually? This really does look like senseless violence.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Click, did you find something?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Sure did. But...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Can you come here, GreyThroat? I... I don't know how to say this...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: In that room...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Your pupils are red again. Control yourself. Don't be afraid. Ayerscarpe, stay outside with her. Warn the mob.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: In here?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: (It's a mess. Someone's last desperate stand... Ugh... are these... frozen limbs?)
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: (Wait, who is this?)
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Gah! She's a doctor?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: If you don't leave, we'll kill you too!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: The solution I just sprayed on you is both volatile and toxic.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wha?! Wh-what did you do to us?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Out with it! Or I'll... I'll... Ugh...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: How do you feel?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Tell me where Biederman is and I'll give you the antidote. Or you can enjoy spending the next few hours vomiting between hallucination episodes.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're sick... I... I don't know... any Biederman. I just... have to kill all... the nobles... nng...
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Then I'm afraid you're all going to stay in jail.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh? A mushroom? That's a big mushroom... Why is it... moving? Why is it biting?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Schultz! We have more wounded! A lot of them! The insurgents took over the market and Maibaumplatz. But many more people are still trapped in Zwölftontechnik Strasse.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They're unstoppable!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Once the fighting started, we lost all hope of stopping anything.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Now we face two possible outcomes: Surrender, or fight.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What should we do?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Surrender, hand over the city to Reunion and the insurgents, and go starve to death in the snow.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If we fight, both sides end up wounded or dead, and the survivors will starve to death in the snow.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Or...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If casualties are unavoidable, we want the fewest possible—*cough* *cough*, *hack*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Ack... *cough* *cough* *cough*, *cough* *hack* *cough*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Schultz— Uncle? Uncle??
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hey! Uncle, that's blood. You're coughing up blood!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Sorry! Just a second! Miss Tatjana!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: My uncle, he can't speak and—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Are you okay? Abnormal breathing, lung lesions resulting in a loss of voice, this calls for... it calls for...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Mr. Severin, he's actually—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You should listen to the doctor and quit smoking. We don't need a test to see you have some serious persistent lung damage.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Let me see here... I need to take this off——
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hey! Don't move!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You... you're Infected?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: These are Oripathy symptoms. The Originium is pushing out from his lungs into his throat. This dark powdery substance below your throat... that's Originium crystals surfacing through your skin.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Your cells have begun fusing with the Originium. Is this why you don't care about your health?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Did he get it from the battle just now?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: This isn't an early symptom or an acute lesion. He's been Infected for some time.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Probably from the Catastrophe... No, that's too recent. It must have been even before that.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*——*cough* *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Black blood clots. Suzuran, take a sample.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Okay! Sorry, sir. I'll be quick.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No way the hospital is functioning right now. Okay, take him into the town hall!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wolumonde... can't be without... her Schultz!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: If you keep pushing yourself, she's definitely going to lose him.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You... really look like a doctor right now.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: *Cough* cough*, *cough* *cough*—
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Phew, looks like I can talk for a minute after coughing up blood. Handy, that.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Tough guy.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I have a favor to ask.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Say your piece, but I'm taking you in. Lisa, hold him. Tatjana, help me lift.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Please, everyone, *cough* *cough*, don't tell anyone I'm Infected...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Then, I'll admit that I was the murderer who set the fire. I was the cause of all Wolumonde's problems...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And what of the real killer?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I don't care. I can't.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But at least... they'll have their scapegoat, and no excuse to keep fighting.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But it's not enough... Without an external force strong enough to clamp down on them, they'll continue their cycle of revenge.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So I request... Rhodes Island's assistance... Even though we can't afford to pay for it now.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But if Wolumonde survives this disaster... we will repay you.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We aren't a charity.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I'm begging you!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I don't have the authority to make promises on behalf of Rhodes Island. Saving a town of ten thousand people is beyond the scope of our mission, and way beyond the authority Amiya invested in me.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But, for Atro, 'we' won't abandon Wolumonde.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Stand aside, we have a wounded—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: GreyThroat? Why are you alone?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Suzuran, take the Schultz to the upstairs parlor. And don't let anyone see you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Brutal as it may be, once he settles down, Schultz Severin is going to have to stand up and lead again.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Roger that! I'll take care of it!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Tatjana.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: There are riots all over town. People are getting hurt or killed. I... I can't just sit here.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I'll go organize the militia that didn't get caught up in the riot. At least... at least I can do something.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Sure. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Can we talk?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We found Biederman.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We need to capture him immediately and end the riots, we have to avenge Atro—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: He's dead.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...What?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We found him on the 'Gramophone' at coordinate B2.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: There were visible wounds on the back of his head, and ice crystals remained on the surface of his skin. All signs indicated an Arts attack.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: The operator on scene could not make an accurate determination, but wounds on the surrounding cadavers indicated that Biederman had died in the riot at least a few hours prior.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Biederman is dead. But the riots continue. We all know what that means.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Click and Ayerscarpe are searching his residence. Unless they run into trouble—
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Wait...! You said, you said he's already dead?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: If you really need me to repeat myself, yes, he is already dead.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I watched as the smile on Folinic's face froze— Yes, that smile.
The loss of Operator Atro left her emotionally unstable, until we learned about Biederman.
No longer troubled with issues of colonialism, the Infected, or class, she simply, and happily, found her revenge.
Does she feel some momentary relief? Relief at having realized her goal?
What next? How am I to deal with this new... condition of hers?
So it is.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: A Contingency Contract operation agreement. Signed by one Catastrophe Messenger Biederman.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: So then, was it all part of the plan? Including your own death, Biederman?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Hm... but why? Could that Contingency thingamajig be the real mastermind?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Letting people die in a Catastrophe is not really their modus operandi. They wouldn't act in such a... brutal manner.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But if he was helping the insurgents to try to save more lives...? Why?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Is this really going to save lives, at the end of the day? GreyThroat says Wolumonde is in a real bad spot right now.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: No. The Contingency Contract is just a platform.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: It is true that a small percentage of the Messengers using the Contingency Contract have a utilitarian obsession, leading them to 'save' as many people as possible.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Wolumonde had already suffered a Catastrophe. Could he have... set the fire to draw in outside forces to intervene...?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I'm so glad Leonhardt and Rhodes Island's other Catastrophe Messengers don't get so mixed up with them.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: But... that can't be right... What if..
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Ayerscarpe!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Look over there! By the music store! What's that weird thing?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: It's a... mountain?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No. It's a big moving boulder?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Could it be that one guy's Arts?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That isn't the kind of thing one man's Arts can do. Let's hurry back to the others!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There's no way an ordinary town militia is going to stand against a battle-hardened combat squad, and a Sarkaz one at that!
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: What's that? An earthquake?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Ah! It's that rock monster again! Quick! Start the 'Gramophone!'
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: They came! Reunion is here to liberate us!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Long live Reunion! Forward! Drive out the rotten nobles!
attributes.name: Armed Infected A

attributes.content: Long live Reunion!
attributes.name: Armed Infected B

attributes.content: Cover their retreat. Get back to the town center and activate the Gramophone. And stay safe!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Tatjana, that one at the end of the street... do you know him?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Halt. At ease.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yes. We are now just one step away.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: One step away from destroying this town.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But there is no hope behind us. They cheer for liberation. But all we have freed is their anger and hatred. This is a typical, bloody invasion.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Is it? I don't really care. At this point, a happy ending is out of the question.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: This is the last chance... a chance to give them, before we take the last step.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: A chance to surrender?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No... a chance to fight back. A chance to show conviction and let us stand in for the people... let us decide the winners and losers for ourselves.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's tough, thankless work, being a mercenary. Always the toughest. Never appreciated.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Whatever. It's your call.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Then—
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: —Arise, great boulder.
attributes.name: Mudrock
